Publications

  • Coelho F, Paulo J, Vilaça R, Pereira J, Oliveira R (2017). HTAPbench: Hybrid Transactional and Analytical Processing Benchmark. ACM/SPEC International Conference on Performance Engineering (ICPE).

  • Macedo R, Paulo J, Pontes R, Portela B, Oliveira T, Matos M, Oliveira R (2017). A Practical Framework for Privacy-Preserving NoSQL Databases. IEEE International Symposium on Reliable Distributed Systems (SRDS).

  • Coelho F, Matos M, Pereira J, Oliveira R (2017). Similarity Aware Shuffling for the Distributed Processing of SQL Window Functions. Distributed Applications and Interoperable Systems (DAIS).

  • Coelho F, Pereira J, Vilaça R, Oliveira R (2016). Holistic Shuffler for the Parallel Execution of SQL Window Functions. Distributed Applications and Interoperable Systems (DAIS).

  • Ribeiro J, Machado N, Maia F, Matos M. (2018). Totally Ordered Replication for Massive Scale Key-Value Stores. Distributed Applications and Interoperable Systems (DAIS).

We are part of the High-Assurance Software Laboratory, one of the integrated R&D centres of INESC TEC and a subunit of University of Minho.
